channel.title: Net beans and Hyperion

item.title: Net beans and Hyperion
item.dc:creator: @Xata27 Xata27
item.description:
@Xata27 wrote:

I’m trying to get Hyperion to work in Net beans, but it keeps complaining about a few packages not existing (the apache packages) But when ever I try to add the apache library to my project it never has the packages I need. So where do I find them.
A few that I’m missing:
org.apache.commons.compress.compressors.bzip2.BZip2CompressorInputStream
org.apache.mina.core.service.IoHandlerAdapter;
org.apache.mina.core.session.IoSession;
org.apache.mina.filter.codec.ProtocolCodecFilter;
org.apache.mina.filter.codec.textline.TextLineCodecFactory;

And apache mina’s library doesn’t seem to have these.
Any help?
Thanks!

Read full topic
